Name: Cannot upgrade HGCP A la carte product to Performance Sync
SBQQ__AdvancedCondition__c: (1 AND 3 AND 2 AND 4 AND 5 AND 11 AND (8 OR 9)) OR (1 AND 3 AND 6 AND 4 AND 5 AND 12 AND (9 OR 10)) OR (1 AND 3 AND 7 AND 4 AND 5 AND 13 AND (8 OR 10))
SBQQ__ErrorMessage__c: You cannot upgrade a Performance (HGCP) product to the Performance Sync Promotion.
